```{r}
alldf <- readRDS("./alldf.rds")
alldf$type[(alldf$type == 2)] = 1  # 1: 跟團，2:自由行，3:混合
alldf$type[(alldf$type == 5)] = 4  
alldf %>% count(nation, type) %>% group_by(nation)  %>%  mutate(percent = n/sum(n))

# 畫直方圖

```
